评论概述: Great walking shoe, not a boating shoe
评论详情: I absolutely love these shoes. I've worn out 2 pairs in 3 years, and just purchased and received a new pair. They are great for walking and easy to wash. If you like wearing shoes without socks, they work too, but you will want to replace the insole with odor-suppressing insole, as these insole get stinky in no time. As for boating - not so much. The design resembles the "classic" boating shoe, but the sole is too slippery for a wet deck. Trust me, I tried. If you need shoes for sailing - get some real stuff that grips the deck

These are my favorite shoes I've ever owned.  They are so comfortable and light weight.  I walk 8-10 hours a day every day for work, and have always found that my feet hurt at the end of the day.  Whether it be boots, sneakers, whatever, the result was always the same. I saw these on here and decided to give them a try, and wow, what a difference.  They have memory foam which ups the comfort level, but again, the light weight feel makes a huge difference.  I've worn these to work, on vacation, just basically everywhere.  They are slip on, so these are perfect for travel. And they are so cute! I've gotten a bunch of questions asking where I get them.  Highly recommend these.

评论概述: These are just as comfy as the Skechers of years earlier!
评论详情: This has been my preferred brand for many years but finding any style in my size was the overwhelming challenge (God decided that "petite" was not the design for my creation).  I was about to surrender to the idea of never finding the brand I wanted until I just "had" to check out the Skechers offered on Amazon.  To my great surprise, MY size was available and they're machine washable, as well!!  I'm thrilled enough that this not my last purchase!  I've been so dissatisfied with so many other brands that I'm amazed at the great comfort I'm experiencing.  Thank you for producing these in sizes for larger ladies to enjoy.  Sacrificing style and foot comfort is asking too much of today's chore-laden women.  That problem is solved when wearing Skechers in their preferred styles and colors.  This is pure gratitude from a GREATLY pleased forever customer!  I hope Skechers manufactures tall, warm winter boots in my size, as well. What a wonderful Christmas gift that will be!
Stylish, nice color, comfy.

These shoes are really cute.  I didn't want something that looks like a sneaker.  I'm going on a trip and will be doing many excursions so I was looking for something that would be stylish with jeans or cargo pants and more importantly will be comfortable for a lot of walking.  While these shoes are really comfortable, the soles themselves don't seem to have enough cushion in them.  They kind of feel like I'm standing on concrete despite the cushy insoles.  So, not sure if these will be the right shoes for my trip, but I still love them and will get plenty of use out of them.  I'm actually thinking about getting a second pair.
